languages.text: "Вы уж не будьте с-строги к нам, сироубогим, Ваша Светлость! Мы, это, сами жертвы!"
"Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"
languages.original_text: "Вы уж не будьте с-строги к нам, сироубогим, Ваша Светлость! Мы, это, сами жертвы!"

traits.locale_text: "Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"
"Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"
"Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"
"Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"
"Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"
"Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"

languages.text: “请您不要对我们这些不幸惑众太苛刻，大人！如您所知，我们也都是受害者！”
languages.original_text: "Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"

traits.locale_text: “请您不要对我们这些不幸惑众太苛刻，大人！如您所知，我们也都是受害者！”

languages.text: 「私達不幸な者に、手厳しくしないでください！陛下！私達も、被害者なんです！」
languages.original_text: "Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"

traits.locale_text: 「私達不幸な者に、手厳しくしないでください！陛下！私達も、被害者なんです！」

languages.text: «¡No sea tan dur{mf|o|a} con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No somos más que víctimas».
languages.original_text: "Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No sea tan dur{mf|o|a} con nosotros, mi{mf|lord|lady}! No somos más que víctimas».

languages.text: "Seid nicht zu streng mit uns elenden Unglückseligen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Wir sind hier auch Opfer, wisst Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"

traits.locale_text: "Seid nicht zu streng mit uns elenden Unglückseligen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Wir sind hier auch Opfer, wisst Ihr?"

languages.text: « Soyez pas trop {mf|dur|dure} avec nous, Votre Seigneurie. Nous aussi, on est des victimes, vous savez ! »
languages.original_text: "Don't be too harsh on us wretched unfortunables, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! We're, you know, victims here too!"

traits.locale_text: « Soyez pas trop {mf|dur|dure} avec nous, Votre Seigneurie. Nous aussi, on est des victimes, vous savez ! »
